channel.title: Having trouble with two things
channel.description: Ok I have a server and when I try to get on I can, when other people try they can get on but when more than 4 people try to get on they cant. So my question is how can i make it so more than 4 people can get online at the same time? Also another problem I have is I want to make an object require a member status to be able to be used. Please help me.

item.title: Having trouble with two things
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

grimreaper61:

You still did not capitalize your first letter. Isn’t this just that you don’t have the specs to be running a server? I can handle over 100 people fine. RAM is good…get some.

I have fine specs(2Gb RAM), I had over 200 ppl on my last server (witch was the same source) but now i can only have up to 4 ppl on it. and i just don’t understand why.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 12, 2008, 09:32:22 pm[/size][hr]Please help me?!?!?!?!?!?!

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble with two things
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

I also meant re-write the sentence in proper english. Right now its a run on and sounds like crap. Say things out loud and read them over before you post, because coming across as an idiot will make the people who know what they are doing ignore you.

Your server is screwed up, even WinterLove servers can get at least 20 people on. (Which in reality is unacceptable; even 1000 players isn’t good, thats still 1/2 of a real RuneScape server.)

FusionLord:

English is my native Language and just because i have one typo doesn’t make any scene to lock my post

You had capitalization errors, loads of typos, and I could barely understand what you meant. For example, you didn’t capitalize your I, and your forgot punctuation. And language shouldn’t be capitalized. And “doesn’t make any scene to lock my post” doesn’t make any sense at all.

Read full topic
